episodes.title: MURDER IN CHURCH I A CULT THAT KILLED 3,000 PEOPLE
episodes.description: A tragic story of faith and death. How a prostitute connived with highly respected public figures to recruit masses in a killed and carryout cold murders for over a decade. On march 17, 2000, a cult led by Credonia Mwerinde, Joseph Kibwetere and others killed hundreds of believers in an inferno when set alight a church in Kanungu district, Western Uganda.
subjects: Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God
